description:
After seeing Rei through his final moments, Kenshiro begins his journey once again.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Beginning of Part Three: Supreme Rules in Turbulence! As the South Star Fades, the North Star Appears!!
Daisanbu Kaishi: Ransei Hadouhen - Nanto Midarurutoki Hokuto Arawareri!!
第3部開始 乱世覇道編 南斗乱るる時北斗現われり!!
